ABSTRACT The development of antiviral drugs for Ebola and Marburg viruses has been slow. To date, beyondsupportive care, no effective treatments, prophylactic measures, therapies or vaccines are approved totreat or prevent filovirus infections. In this review, we examine the current treatments available toadminister care for filovirus infection, the potential therapeutic targets that can be used for filovirus drugdevelopment, and the various drug targeting techniques used against filoviruses. 15.
